DOC.detailed_description: Conventional hemodialysis use large amount water , hinders travel possibilies home hemodialysis ( HD ) patient . We develop recycle system use 25-30 l dialysate per dialysis . In vitro investigation show result adequate dialysis . 12 HD patient study two dialysis session . The first HD conventional 4 hour dialysis , use single pas dialysate . The second 8-hour HD use multipass ( recycle ) dialysate 25-30 l. Clearance urea , creatinine , phosphate cobalamin measure patient dialysate . Patient symptom record .
